title: Hierarchical file tree
description: Use build_file_tree() and flatten_tree() from git/file_tree.rs to display files in folder hierarchy instead of flat list.

title: Add README
description: Create README.md with installation instructions, screenshots, usage examples, and feature list.

title: Persist theme settings in config file
description: Read and write UI theme preference to a config file (e.g., ~/.config/lado/config.toml) so it persists between sessions. Currently theme resets to dark on every launch.

title: Switch between PR commits
description: Allow navigating between commits in a PR. Comments are tied to specific commits - show which commit a comment references and let user view that commit's diff.

title: File selection loads diff
description: Clicking a file in the file tree should load that file's diff lines into the diff view. Currently only the first file is loaded on startup.

title: Support color themes
description: Add theme switching (solarized-light, solarized-dark, monokai, etc). Theme config in ui/theme.slint needs to be dynamic.

title: Show PR title in toolbar
description: When viewing a PR, display PrInfo.title in the toolbar instead of just PR #N.

title: Show PR comments from GitHub
description: Fetch and display PR review comments inline with diff using gh CLI. Show comment author, timestamp, and thread context.

title: Integrate syntax highlighting
description: Connect SyntaxHighlighter from highlighting/syntax.rs to diff view. Color code content based on file extension.

title: Keyboard navigation
description: Arrow keys to navigate file list, u/s to toggle unified/side-by-side view, Enter to select file.

title: Display hunk headers in diff view
description: Show @@ -X,Y +X,Y @@ separator lines between diff hunks. The DiffHunk.header field is already parsed but not rendered.

title: J/K navigation should directly load files without Enter
description: Currently when using J/K keys to navigate through the file list, the user has to press Enter to load and display the diff for the selected file. The navigation should directly load the file when moving to it with J/K, providing a more fluid browsing experience similar to vim-style navigation in other diff tools.

title: Theme not loading from config on startup
description: When config.toml has ui_theme set to 'solarized-light', the application still starts with the default dark theme instead of applying the saved theme preference.

title: Diff viewer should extend to window bottom
description: The diff viewer's bottom edge aligns with the file tree panel or has a fixed height. It should stretch all the way down to the window's bottom edge for better use of screen space.

title: Highlight selected file in side panel
description: When a file is selected in the file tree/list, visually highlight it to show which file is currently being viewed in the diff panel. This improves UX by making it clear which file the user is looking at.

title: Update all crates to latest versions
description: Update all dependencies in Cargo.toml to their latest versions. Note: slint is already at 1.14.

title: Sync focused-index when file is selected with mouse
description: When selecting a file by clicking with the mouse, the focused-index is not updated. This means if the user clicks file #5 then presses J/K, keyboard navigation starts from wherever focused-index was last set (e.g. file #0) instead of from the clicked file (#5). The focused-index should be updated to match the clicked file's index.
